org.youscope.common.scripting

Interface RemoteScriptEngine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Callback, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface RemoteScriptEngine
extends Callback
    Author:
    langmo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void eval(java.lang.String script)
      Executes the specified script.
      void eval(java.net.URL scriptFile)
      Executes the script in the specified file.
      void put(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object value)
      Sets a key/value pair in the state of the RemoteScriptEngine that may either create a Java Language Binding to be used in the execution of scripts or be used in some other way, depending on whether the key is reserved.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.youscope.common.callback.Callback

        getTypeIdentifier, initializeCallback, pingCallback, uninitializeCallback

    • Method Detail

      • eval

        void eval(java.lang.String script)
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
          javax.script.ScriptException
        Executes the specified script. The default ScriptContext for the ScriptEngine is used.
        Parameters:
        script - The source for the script.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        javax.script.ScriptException - Thrown if an error during the execution of the script occurred.

      • eval

        void eval(java.net.URL scriptFile)
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
          javax.script.ScriptException,
          java.io.IOException
        Executes the script in the specified file. The default ScriptContext for the ScriptEngine is used. An IO exception is thrown if the script could not be opened or was not found.
        Parameters:
        scriptFile - The file containing the script. The path of the file has to be set for the computer where this script engine resides on.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        javax.script.ScriptException - Thrown if an error during the execution of the script occurred.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the given file could not be found or opened.

      • put

        void put(java.lang.String key,
         java.lang.Object value)
  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
         java.lang.NullPointerException,
         java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets a key/value pair in the state of the RemoteScriptEngine that may either create a Java Language Binding to be used in the execution of scripts or be used in some other way, depending on whether the key is reserved. Might throw a remote exception if value is neither serializable nor implementing interface Remote.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of named value to add.
        value - The value of named value to add.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if key is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if key is empty.
